entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
